description: Monitor Plex as a service including docker *arr collectors, disk arrays, and UPS - by u/SpinCharm

targets.query: SELECT distinct("hash") FROM "Tautulli" WHERE ("type" = 'Session') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "audio_codec", "device_type", "full_location", "media_type", "product", "product_version", "quality", "quality_profile", "relayed", "secure", "stream_audio_codec", "title", "transcode_decision", "username", "quality", "quality_profile", "player_state", "location", "region_code", "progress_percent" ORDER BY time DESC

SELECT distinct("hash") FROM "Tautulli" WHERE ("type" = 'Session') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "audio_codec", "device_type", "full_location", "media_type", "product", "product_version", "quality", "quality_profile", "relayed", "secure", "stream_audio_codec", "title", "transcode_decision", "username", "quality", "quality_profile", "player_state", "region_code" ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT last("http_response_code") FROM "http_response" WHERE ("server" =~ /^$url_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY server
SELECT distinct("hash") FROM "Sonarr" WHERE ("type" = 'Future') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "downloaded", "name", "sxe"

panels.description: Note: Uses REGEX to Parse Fan Names From IPMI Sensor List!

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(fan_input),1s) FROM "sensors" WHERE ("feature" = 'fan1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Fan Speeds

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("bytes_sent"), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE ("interface" = 'br0' AND "host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("bytes_recv"), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "interface" = 'eth0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "sensors" WHERE ("feature" = 'auxtin0' AND "host" ='sophie') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name"
SELECT last("value") FROM "sensors" WHERE ("feature" = 'auxtin0' AND "host" ='sophie') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name"
SELECT last("value") FROM "sensors" WHERE ("feature" = 'auxtin0' AND "host" ='sophie') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name"
SELECT last("value") FROM "sensors" WHERE ("feature" = 'auxtin0' AND "host" ='sophie') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name"

SELECT last("used")  / 1000000000000 AS "Used", last("free")  / 1000000000000 AS "Free", last("total")  / 1000000000000 AS "Total", last("used_percent") AS "Used %" FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" = 'sophie' OR "path" = '/media/management' OR "path" = '/media/systems' OR "path" = '/' AND "path" <> '/var/lib/docker' AND "fstype" <> 'rootfs' AND "path" <> '/mnt/user' AND "path" <> '/mnt/user0' AND "path" <> '/mnt/cache' AND "path" !~ /^$Path_Unassigned$/ AND "host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "path", "device", "fstype"

panels.description: User Overrides > Display Name to Dynamically Name Serial Number (Field Name) to Drive Number

targets.query: SELECT last("temp_c") FROM "smart_device" WHERE ("device" = 'sg3' OR "device" = 'sg4' OR "device" = 'sg5' OR "device" = 'sg1' ) AND "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "serial_no"

panels.title: Array Drive Temps

panels.description: User Overrides > Display Name to Dynamically Name Serial Number (Field Name) to Drive Number

targets.query: SELECT last("temp_c") FROM "smart_device" WHERE ("device" != 'sg3' AND "device" != 'sg4' AND "device" != 'sg5'  AND "device" != 'sg1' ) AND "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "serial_no"

panels.title: Non-Array Drive Temps

targets.query: SELECT last("health_ok") AS "Health OK?" FROM "smart_device" WHERE ("device" =~ /.*/ AND "host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device"
SELECT last("load_percent") FROM "apcupsd" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT sum("LOADPCT") / 100 * 865 FROM "APC" WHERE "LOADPCT" = 'loadpercent' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s) fill(null)
SELECT sum("LOADPCT") / 100 * 865 FROM "APC" WHERE "LOADPCT" = 'loadpercent' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s) fill(null)
SELECT sum("LOADPCT") / 100 * 865 FROM "APC" WHERE "LOADPCT" = 'loadpercent' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s) fill(null)

panels.description: Note:  Uses Variables | Adjust Field  Unit For Your Set UPS Currency Variable As Required!

targets.query: SELECT sum("LOADPCT") / 100 * 865 FROM "APC" WHERE "LOADPCT" = 'loadpercent' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s) fill(null)

panels.title: Est. Monthly

targets.query: SELECT sum("LOADPCT") / 100 * 865 FROM "APC" WHERE "LOADPCT" = 'loadpercent' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM http_response WITH KEY=server
list.label: URL
list.name: url_name
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM http_response WITH KEY=server

title: Plex Service Management
